login.legal: Yes, I have read and agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

signup-success.title: Verify your E-Mail
signup-success.text: The SignUp was successful! Please verify your email. We have send a confirmation E-Mail to '{{ email }}'.
signup-success.resend-text: If you haven't received the E-Mail after a few minutes you can click the button below to resend it. Please also check your junk folder.

verifyEmail.success: Your E-Mail has been verified! Login to begin your cozy adventure.
verifyEmail.error: There was an error during the verification

reset-password.title: Reset Password
reset-password.request-success: We have send an E-Mail containing the reset instructions to {{ email }}. The message may need a few minutes to be delivered. Please also check your junk folder.
reset-password.reset-success: Password reset was successful. You can now login!

add-book-dialog.title: Add Book
add-book-dialog.already-in-collection: You Already Have This Book In Your Collection

home.noBooks: There aren't any books in this collection yet
home.noMatchFilter: No books in this collection match the filter

subtitles.export: Request a full export of the data we hold about your account in compliance with GDRP.
subtitles.danger-zone: Permanently delete your account and all data relating to it. Your account can not be recovered once it has been deleted!
subtitles.visibility: Decide if other users should be able to see your collection or if you want to keep it for yourself.
subtitles.password: Changing your password will sign you out on all devices you are currently logged in on!
subtitles.sessions: Manage where you are logged in.
subtitles.emails: Chose which EMails you want to receive from us.

labels.private: Your account is hidden! Click the toggle to make it visible to other users.
labels.public: Your account is currently visible. Click the toggle to make it hidden from other users.

deletedialog.title: Are you sure?
deletedialog.text: Deleting your account will result in all data being instantly deleted from your account. There is no way to recover it once it has been deleted. Your account name and e-mail can instantly be used to create a new account.
deletedialog.confirm-text: Yes, I do understand the consequences that occur when deleting my account.

report.title: Report User
report.hint: The books owned by a user aren't a valid reason to report. Abuse of the report feature will result in a ban.

book.hidden: This book is hidden in the public view
book.noGroup: This book has been excluded from automatic grouping
